text: @SenSchumer Exactly what is your strategy? Oh yes. You have no ideas. You are clueless. You are part of the problem finger pointing useless DO NOTHING CONGRESS.  Just send bills to the Senate packed full of pork having NOTHING to do with covid19. You call that HERO? Get real!
